source: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_SEQ_00<tab>Marcette would keep your nose to the grindstone.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_SEQ_00<tab>ダンスタン監視哨のマルセットは、まだまだ研究を手伝わせたいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_SEQ_01<tab>Marcette requires a freshly extracted stroper stomach for her latest experiment. Use the medicine she has provided you with to neutralize its foul breath, then slay the creature and extract its innards.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_SEQ_01<tab>今度はストローパーの生態を調べるようだ。<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E883E01 /var>を使って「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2080901 /var>」を倒し、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87DE01 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained the putrid stomach of a stroper. Deliver the foul mess to Marcette before you pass out from the unbearable stench.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87DE01 /var>を入手した。ダンスタン監視哨のマルセットに「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87DE01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_SEQ_03<tab>Never have you seen anyone so happy to receive a putrid pile of innards. Marcette is once again tremendously pleased with herself, and─from the fact that she remembered your number─might even genuinely appreciate your efforts this time.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_SEQ_03<tab>冒険者の協力で、またひとつマルセットの研究が進んだようだ。新エオルゼア博物誌が無事に完成することを祈ろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_TODO_00<tab>Use Marcette's medicine and kill a halitostroper.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E883E01 /var>を使って<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2080901 /var>を討伐

source: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_000<tab>Research Assistant Eight Hundred Seventy-three! You're late!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_000さあ、次なる研究よ、第九助手！
「」の
「」をもぎ取ってらっしゃい！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_001<tab>I am conducting an experiment of the utmost importance to determine the source of the distinctive stink of a stroper's breath, and require one freshly extracted stroper stomach.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_001私の学説が正しければ、
の中には……！
ククククク……アハハハハハッ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_002<tab>The stench is said to be strong enough to knock out a man, so I shall provide you with a bottle of Marcette's Breath-Be-Gone. I know not what you've been eating lately, but you may want to take a dose of it yourself.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_002ああそうだ、そのまま突っ込むと、死ぬわよ。
の臭い息は、特に最悪なんだから。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_003<tab>Oh, and do try not to get killed, will you? Funeral rites for incompetent assistants are eating away an inordinate share of my research budget these days.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_003に挑むときは、
この「」を使うといいわ。
葬儀なんて面倒だから、ちゃんと使うのよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_010<tab>Assistant Whatever-your-number-was! I haven't all week! You'd best have the stroper stomach I requested, or I do believe I shall use your own innards as a substitute!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_010早く「」の中身が見てみたいわ！
さあ、第……ええと、十三助手だったかしら？
とにかく、さっそく解体するわよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_011<tab>Yes, yes─just hand it over, will you? And the dissection reveals...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_011……やっぱり、トードスツールの成れの果てが大量にあるわ！
霊災後にストローパーの生息数が、急激に増加した原因。
それはトードスツールにあったのよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_012<tab>...Exactly as I surmised! With the proliferation of poisonous toadstools in the years since the Calamity, the stroper's diet has undergone a dramatic change. The reaction of the toadstools with the stroper's stomach acids results in the noxious gases emitted from the mouth of the foul beast!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_012ストローパーは、毒性のあるトードスツールを摂取して、
体内に有毒ガスを発生させ……これを武器に獲物を仕留める。
まさに食物連鎖ね！　さっそく原稿を執筆しないと……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_013<tab>And with that groundbreaking discovery, I believe I owe my prodigious mind a well-deserved respite. You, on the other hand, Research Assistant Six, have earned nothing of the sort! Get out there and hone your skills, that you might actually make yourself half-useful the next time I call upon you.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA912_00807_MARCETTE_000_013さて、これで今回の研究は終わり！
次の研究が決まったら、またお願いするわね！
いろいろ助かったわよ、第四十二助手！
